about_the_game:
This DLC is playable in Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival game modes like Taiko Mode, Great Drum Toy War and Run! Ninja Dojo.

Vocaloid™ Songs Collection
- Song: Good-bye Declaration
Easy ★3, Normal ★5, Difficult ★6, Extreme ★8
- Song: Lagtrain
Easy ★3, Normal ★5, Difficult ★5, Extreme ★7
- Song: Luka Luka★Night Fever
Easy ★3, Normal ★6, Difficult ★7, Extreme ★8
- Song: Lower one's eyes
Easy ★2, Normal ★4, Difficult ★6, Extreme ★8
- Song: DARLING DANCE
Easy ★3, Normal ★5, Difficult ★6, Extreme ★8
- Song: Yoidore Shirazu
Easy ★3, Normal ★3, Difficult ★5, Extreme ★8
- Song: ASUNO YOZORA SHOKAIHAN
Easy ★4, Normal ★6, Difficult ★7, Extreme ★9
- Song: Venom (feat. flower)
Easy ★2, Normal ★4, Difficult ★6, Extreme ★8
- Song: A Tale of Six Trillion Years and a Night
Easy ★3, Normal ★5, Difficult ★7, Extreme ★9

*The songs included in this product may also be available in the Taiko Music Pass.
